Abi.name: German Abitur (High School Graduation)
Abi.text: After 12 years of school I finally graduated at the Humboldt-Gymnasium in Berlin.

Biber.name: 1. Prize Biber Contest
Biber.text: In 10th grade I won the first prize in the Biber contest.

Bachelor.name: Bachelor of Science
Bachelor.text: After 3 years of studying at the Duale Hochschule Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg in Stuttgart, I completed my Bachelor of Science in Business Informatics / Data Science with an average grade of 1.5.
